anime_series.title: Naruto
anime_series.synopsis: Follows the journey of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a dream of becoming the strongest ninja and leader of his village.

anime_series.title: Clannad After Story
anime_series.synopsis: A continuation of the original Clannad series, focusing on the life of Tomoya Okazaki and his relationships after high school.

anime_series.title: Code Geass
anime_series.synopsis: Lelouch, an exiled prince, gains a mysterious power and uses it to seek revenge against the Britannian Empire.

anime_series.title: Kuroko's Basketball
anime_series.synopsis: The story of a high school basketball team striving to be the best in Japan, led by the mysterious player, Kuroko.

anime_series.title: Spy x Family
anime_series.synopsis: An elite spy forms a fake family as part of a mission, but things get complicated as they grow closer.

anime_series.title: Death Note
anime_series.synopsis: A high school student discovers a notebook with the power to kill anyone whose name is written in it.

anime_series.title: Attack on Titan
anime_series.synopsis: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid creatures known as Titans.

anime_series.title: Bleach
anime_series.synopsis: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and must protect the living world from dark spirits.

anime_series.title: Food Wars
anime_series.synopsis: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary school and faces various cooking challenges.

anime_series.title: Link Click
anime_series.synopsis: Two individuals possess the ability to travel through time using photographs, but with certain limitations.
